# tf.quantize_v2

``` python
quantize_v2(
    input,
    min_range,
    max_range,
    T,
    mode='MIN_COMBINED',
    name=None,
    round_mode='HALF_AWAY_FROM_ZERO'
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.5/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py).

See the guide: [Tensor Transformations > Slicing and Joining](../../../api_guides/python/array_ops#Slicing_and_Joining)

Please use `tf.quantize` instead.
